column2: "Lilii! I heard someone say that the Lillipans of planet Lillipa are in trouble!"
"The Mechs are going berserk and attacking Lillipans!"
"Lilii... I'm worried about those Lillipans! We speak different languages now... But we come from the same ancestors."
"Please! Help them out by taking out those Mechs! You're the only one I can ask!!"
